node.text:
The Sunday Brunch spread at The Raviz Kovalam is no doubt an epic start to the weekend for anyone seeking brunch with a difference. We can’t blame you if it feels like Sundays are the bestest days of the week ever!

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
